text: Ara tara bale -- ''amara yadi tomara sange dharmapatha anusarana kari tahale amadera desa theke amadera utkhata kara habe.â€™â€™ Amara ki tadera jan'ya eka nirapada punyasthana pratisthita kari ni yekhane ana haya hareka rakamera phala-phasala, amadera tarapha theke riyekasbarupe? Kintu tadera adhikansa'i jane na.
